entries.title: Well, here's Shrek in Fallout 4
entries.description: It's the end of the world, all over again.

entries.title: This Witcher 3 mod can help snatch valuable performance from its hungry ray tracing
entries.description: It's not gonna be a miracle on an RTX 3050, but Optimized Raytracing definitely helps eke out a higher framerate.

entries.title: Skyblivion announces 2025 release date
entries.description: Though it might make it out sooner, with your help.

entries.title: This gnarly FPS with a rear view mirror wants you shooting backwards
entries.description: I thought "oh that's neat" then played the demo and got blasted into my chair like a kid in an old Sega ad.

entries.title: Today's Wordle 575 answer and hint for Sunday, January 15
entries.description: Wordle today: The solution and a hint for the #575 puzzle.

entries.title: The Dungeons & Dragons community imploded over a leaked draft of a license change
entries.description: A new version of the OGL caused sweeping upheaval in tabletop RPGs—and still hasn't actually been implemented.

entries.title: One Piece Odyssey review
entries.description: An easygoing JRPG that's the equivalent of an anime filler arc.

entries.title: In 1998, hardboiled gumshoe Detective Barbie cracked the case of the carnival caper
entries.description: We're rerunning Richard Cobbett's classic Crapshoot column, in which he rolled the dice and took a chance on obscure games—both good and bad.

entries.title: Lost Ark players with inactive accounts caught by wave of bot bans
entries.description: Bans show on your public Steam profile, and people aren't happy about that.
